title: Clariant keeps full year guidance after meeting forecasts in H1
content: ZURICH, July 27 Swiss chemicals group Clariant , which is carrying out a $20 billion merger with U.S. peer Huntsman reported first half operating profit in line with expectations on Thursday and confirmed its guidance for the year.
